EmailTemplate.description: Follow-up email for post-market offer to Denver, Philly, and Rhode Island RE
EmailTemplate.name: Post: DPRI Follow-Up Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow-up to my voicemail
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
I just left you a voicemail about an exciting opportunity with Five Star Professional.
For just $95:
Get listed in {!Contact.Core_Magazine_name__c} Receive a congratulatory letter from our team that you can forward to your clients Get an announcement post from Five Star Professional on Facebook or LinkedIn
Call me or email to finalize!
Thank you,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} Account Manager Five Star Professional {!Contact.OwnerPhone} {!Contact.OwnerEmail} www.fivestarprofessional.com
